title: Energetically yours
creator_credit: David Hilberman, Walter Lowendahl and Transfilm
brief_description: An animated film by Ronald Searle which traces man’s search for sources of energy to help him in his daily life. It tells of our need and use of energy since primitive times - from fire, through coal and oil, to the atom.
